Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: GT
Reviews.Content: Cons: 1) Weak mount  2) Excessive LED light  3) Cheap plastic  4) Short cable  5) Would be better with motion sensor(saves battery life)  6) Not durable for outdoor usePros:  1)Cheap  2)Simple

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: micukm
Reviews.Content: This is a real deal looking camera, a red led blinks giving it a working appearance.The only thing I would change about the camera is the blinking speed, it would be nice if it blinked a little less. Nevertheless, this is an awesome product.CCTV Security stickers is a great plus!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Shelly N. Shipman
Reviews.Content: They work well, batteries still going in the Fl heat. A little much if you ask me but still works and ill take all the deterrents i can.

Reviews.Title: This camera is ok
Reviews.Author: Maria Kocon
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my elderly neighbor and she used it in her screened in porch for several months until someone cut a hole in the screen and stole the camera. She should have mounted it better and it would have been ok I think.

Reviews.Title: Batteries last about 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: CA Cupcake "Cupcake"
Reviews.Content: If you buy it install it where you won't need a ladder to change the batteries.  I used Panasonic heavy duty AA batteries and need to change way too often.

Reviews.Title: Excellent- serves its purpose
Reviews.Author: YukonYak4life
Reviews.Content: Looks very realistic! I don't even bother with putting batteries to have a flashing light, and just because there's no blinking light it doesn't make it look like it's not working! How is a crook going to know??? Very good product.

Reviews.Title: Wireless fake would be better
Reviews.Author: Jim F.
Reviews.Content: This is the second one of these I got for monitoring front and back doors (the other one was a different brand but same configuration.  My neighbor noticed the one near my front door and thought it was real.  It is very realistic looking.  The main negatives are the fake cable is difficult to make realistic and the inability to turn the flashing red light on and off without removing the battery.  In hindsight a wireless fake would be a better option, but overall I am satisfied with the product or I wouldn't have bought a second one.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real!
Reviews.Author: Scott Dakota "scottkb2000"
Reviews.Content: This fake security cam looks just like the real thing, for a fraction of the cost. It blinks constantly (battery powered) and so far has kept all the "dummies" at bay. I will update if this changes...but I don't expect any "smart" car thief's to enter the picture unless they figure out who wrote this post.

Reviews.Title: Terrific value
Reviews.Author: Scott McArthur
Reviews.Content: I love these things. Owned them on old house too. Any low life casing the hood is going to hit someone else. Probably won't even pick on my neighbors either.

Reviews.Title: REAL-LIKE
Reviews.Author: chris08
Reviews.Content: These things are perfect for when we go out of town!!! and it is very funny when people come up to the door and wave at the cameras....the batteries may need changing almost every week, but we only put in batteries when we go out of the city or when we may be returning late at night, so when were home we take the batteries out so were not spending lots of money with that situation.Overall they look very realistic and difintely recommend them!!! :)

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to do and at a very reasonable price
Reviews.Author: PGH Karen
Reviews.Content: It is realistic enough to deter criminals which is what I wanted.  I have an alarm system but I bought this because I want to PREVENT my house from being broken into. My house was broken into and although the alarm scared the burgler away, there was a significant amount of damage which needed to be repaired. Hoping this will deter the criminal before they kick the sliding glass door in!

Reviews.Title: Very realistic
Reviews.Author: Jay Proeic
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these based on the reviews here to add to my authentic surveillance system. I am quite impressed with this fake camera. It is sturdy and looks like a real camera. I don't plan on using the flashing LED because real security cameras (at least the ones I've seen) do not have this feature so it would likely be a tip off that it is in fact fake. I would recommend these. Shipping was fast and arrived in tact as well.

Reviews.Title: Even with alkaline batteries, the light lasts only a week.
Reviews.Author: Sofía Cardozo
Reviews.Content: The continuously flashing red LED light uses a lot of batterie.  Even using alkaline batteries, I must replace them every week. I really don't like doing this!

Reviews.Title: They are great
Reviews.Author: Hec
Reviews.Content: These cameras really are nothing shy of real cameras once they are installed, they have fooled everyone that has seen them

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: J. Burton
Reviews.Content: This came with all the mounting screws we needed.  It looks like a real camera, especially since we have it mounted up high.

Reviews.Title: Have NO complaint
Reviews.Author: Teddy
Reviews.Content: Have NO complaint against this fake cam, it looks so real and authentic when it's properly setup and it is well WORTH the money, Im planning to buy more.

Reviews.Title: Looks ok
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Strange the color is diffrent its kind of purble gold color and not silver.Others have said you should not use the light however I want to draw att to it so I want the light to run,

Reviews.Title: Looks Real, great value for money.
Reviews.Author: Jesper Jurcenoks
Reviews.Content: Looks very real,Watch out that you don't break the arm, as the plastic is not the strongest kind.Great value for money.I consider painting it silver for an even more realistic look.
